name: Ninja Ga-Lee
summary: "Ninja Ga-Lee" : A quick to learn, dodge em, 2d pixel art filled, side scrolling Ninja game, where you must see how far of a distance you can make it in the Ninja training - "Ninja Ga-Lee". Run as far as you can while dodging obstacles, collecting coins, picking up health, and attacking enemies as they attempt to stop you from the ultimate Ninja Training session, The Ninja Ga-Lee.
